title: Relating to Your Pastor
abstract: Many church folks can be judgmental or misunderstanding of the men or women of God in their lives, simply because they do not understand where he or she is coming from. This 4-part series will help you, as a Christian, be able to relate and connect with your pastor or leader, bridging any gaps that are keeping you from receiving all that you can from him or her; a vital part of fulfilling your destiny!
